column4: the point is that I have a copy. (here in Brazil we buy copies openly on the streets)
no need to this. I'll also try to talk to them.
(tou tentando achar gente pra montar uma comunidade)
nah. you won't find any help there hehe
: do you already have a mailing list?
no, I'm alone, so there is no point asking them to make one ATM.
my first task is translate the ubuntuguide
ask for a list to him: kiko@async.com.br
: async is the first company supporting Ubuntu Linux in brazil.
how could you be so sure about that?
the company I was working for until the end of the year supportED ubuntu too
lynx informatica, www.lynx.com.br, but you won't find anything about ubuntu there
: kiko is a mozilla key developer
